item.title: How to Start Freelancing From Home
item.dc:creator: dejuanjones101
item.content:encoded:
This article will educate you on “how to start freelancing”. Freelancing is by far one of the most lucrative opportunities on the internet. This is the best time in history to become self-employed as a remote worker. However, you must understand a few matters of becoming an independent contractor for obvious reasons. But first, you must understand why you want to pursue this type of online business. It would be easier to start freelancing once you discover your purpose.

What is Freelancing and How Does it Work

Freelancing, also known as self-employment, is a way for individuals to work independently and not be tied to a single employer. A freelancer is a self-employed person who offers services to clients on a project or contract basis, rather than being an employee of a company. They often work in fields such as writing, graphic design, programming, and consulting, among others. Freelancing has become increasingly popular in recent years, as more and more people are looking for flexibility and autonomy in their careers.

As a term 'freelancing' refers to self-employed individuals who work for themselves. They do not commit to a person or company. Rather, the worker is in business for himself or herself. These independent contractors provide services for businesses or individuals.

Steps to Start Freelancing

If you are considering freelancing, the first step is to identify your skills and expertise. What are you good at? What do you enjoy doing? What are your unique talents? Once you have a clear understanding of your skills, you can start identifying potential clients and projects. This can involve networking, building a portfolio, and marketing your services.

1) Define Your Goals

For beginners, you should always define your goals when you work for yourself. Defining goals enables you to stay on track. Subsequently, you can navigate to your destination. Setting goals will also help you achieve your vision in a timely fashion.

2) Analyze Advantages of Freelancing

I think it's important to analyze the advantages of freelancing. By examining the advantages, you can determine if it's worth your time and effort. Most countries on the planet experience economic meltdowns at some point. For this reason, most people are striving to be their own boss. Most people don't have enough money to launch a startup company. Therefore, many individuals are finding themselves pursuing freelancing opportunities.

3) Analyze Disadvantages of Freelancing

After you analyze the advantages, you should immediately evaluate the disadvantages of freelancing. For instance, these opportunities do not come with medical plans, dental plans, or a retirement package. Therefore, you'll need to be careful about how you manage your money. In addition, most companies will pay you less than your counterparts. Some companies or individuals hire freelancers because they don't want to pay professionals. Therefore, it's critical to evaluate this opportunity. By investigating the disadvantages, you can determine if this is an opportunity you want to pursue.

4) Determine Your Budget

The third step is to determine your budget. To be honest, you will not need much money, but you will need to invest time. Any opportunity that you pursue requires time unless you pay others to do the work for you. To tell the truth, most freelancers spend more time working than people working day jobs. It is also wise to research when you pursue freelance opportunities. The research by itself takes endless amounts of time. It may take much time, but research is vital for success.

5) Build a Portfolio

Next, you need to build your portfolio. You must build your credibility to get noticed. Building your portfolio helps you establish credibility. This is something that you will do the entire time while working online. The process involves jotting down your past experiences, skills, qualifications, and so on.

6) Create Social Profiles

Creating social profiles can always be of use. A social profile gives you a platform to connect with your clients outside of the service provider. In addition, a social profile allows your current clients and potential clients to get to know you personally.

7) Build a Site (Optional)

Building a site can be of use, but it's not mandatory. You can use your website to provide examples of your work, contact information, testimonials, photos, and whatever other information you decide to display. All in all you can grow your business faster by building your own blog.

8) Get a Bank Account

Most companies pay members through direct deposit. Therefore, you will need a bank account in most cases. However, there are companies that still pay members via PayPal. It is free to sign up for a PayPal account. Once you receive deposits in your PayPal account, you can transfer the funds to your bank account.

9) Establish Your Business Legally

No one wants to owe the IRS. Therefore, it's critical to be ready to file a 1099. Once you earn $600, the government requires paying taxes. Every state is different, therefore you should look up the tax requirements for startup businesses or independent contractors in your state.

10) Analyze Your Skills

There are tons of opportunities for freelancers. Therefore, you will need to analyze your skills to determine the opportunity or opportunities you will pursue. You can start by listing your strongest talent. Next jot down things that you have done before, on a job or as a hobby. Then write about things you would like to do.

11) Find Freelance Sites Online

There are several freelance sites online. Search engines are the best resources for finding work. In addition, you can find opportunities on Craigslist. Some employers list local gigs on Craigslist under the jobs and gigs section.

I recommend you pursue opportunities that suit your skill-set. For instance, if you're a skilled marketer you should pursue marketing opportunities. On the other hand, if you enjoy creating content, you should pursue opportunities to create content. In short, you increase the likelihood of success by finding freelance gigs online you enjoy.

In Conclusion

In conclusion, freelancing is a way for individuals to work independently and not be tied to a single employer. It can offer a great deal of autonomy, flexibility, and earning potential. However, it also comes with its own set of challenges, such as managing taxes and benefits, dealing with inconsistent work and income, and the lack of protections and benefits that employees have. Freelancing can be a rewarding choice for many people, but it's important to weigh the pros and cons and to be honest with oneself about skills, interests, and goals. Freelancing also can be a great way to start a business, by testing the waters and gaining experience before turning it into a full-time business.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: How to Start Freelancing From Home
Find out how to start freelancing from home today. Discover tools, tips and insight on becoming a on-demand worker online.
what is freelancing, freelancing, start freelancing from home, how to start freelancing from home, how to start freelancing

item.title: Affiliate Marketing Beginners Guide to Success
item.dc:creator: dejuanjones101
item.content:encoded:
What can you learn here? The "affiliate marketing beginner's guide to success" will teach you the fundamentals of affiliate marketing. Here you can discover the benefits, how it works, and how much associates get paid. More importantly, you can find out how to become an affiliate marketer.

Affiliate marketing is one of the most lucrative passive income ideas for beginners. Its a easy way for newbies to make money on the side. You can make money around the clock 24/7. Meaning, affiliate links along with blogs will continue to work day and night, even while your not online. This can become an efficient combination using SEO and honest writing.

What is Affiliate Marketing?

Affiliate marketing is a performance-based advertising model that rewards publishers for leads, sales, or referrals. It's a process where publishers (you) earn a commission when a referral or customers take action, i.e., purchase goods or services, sign up for free trials, etc.

Typically, associates or affiliates promote a vendor's product(s) or service(s) through websites, blogs, and social media pages. Associates post text links, banners with a referral code so they can get credit.

How Does it Work?

The process is simple. First, the merchant (retailer) hooks up with an affiliate network to increase sales. Then publishers (you) find affiliate programs to promote the merchant's product. The associate (you) promotes the merchant's goods or services on your platform. Finally, the publisher (you) completes a sale to a customer and earns a commission or flat rate.

  1. Find an industry you enjoy,
  2. Select a platform,
  3. Research affiliate programs,
  4. Join affiliate programs,
  5. Promote affiliate campaign.

Another way to define affiliate networks is the middlemen that develop connections between companies, entrepreneurs, and bloggers. The associate earns a fee or flat rate for selling the product or service.

How Much Do Affiliate Marketers Get Paid?

How much do associates (affiliate marketers) get paid? The sky's the limit! Affiliate marketing is one of the most profitable business opportunities online. The reason being is affiliate networks partner with the most popular corporations around the globe. This makes it easy for publishers to increase conversion rates, then convert customers. At any rate, back to the question. Associates can get paid, hundreds, thousands, or millions. Below is a short-list of the top affiliate marketing programs on the internet:

Through the help of a single portal, there are countless advertisers that give access to different affiliate networks for many affiliate programs. As a result, publishers can earn money while they sleep!

So how much can you get paid from affiliate marketing? There are no limits to how much you can earn from affiliate marketing. For instance, Pat Flynn from the Smart Passive Income earned a substantial commission, approximately $2 million through affiliate marketing in 2017.

Affiliate marketers average monthly income - Pat Flynn ($53,000), John Chow ($83,320), Neil Patel ($381,772), Darren Rowse ($40,000).

How to Start Affiliate Marketing (5 Steps)

To become a successful affiliate marketer, you must learn what it takes? That way, you don't waste time. For starters, you must remain patient and work relentlessly. The internet is not the same as before. Nowadays, there's competition in just about every market. Therefore, you must outperform your competitors to get ahead.

1) Find an Affiliate Industry you Enjoy

Step 1 Finding your niche is the first step to achieving success from affiliate marketing. In other words, you must find a topic you are passionate about. The key to success is to find something that you enjoy and have an understanding about. In doing so, you’ll be better off in the long haul. You can enjoy working by choosing to create content on a topic that you enjoy.

2) Select a Platform to Promote your Affiliate Campaign

Step 2. After choosing your niche, you'll need to select a platform to reach and engage with customers. Most affiliate marketers use websites and blogs to connect with customers. However, you could market through podcasts, videos, or word-of-mouth. It’s important to understand it's not what you use, it's how you use it. So if your strong point is face-to-face verbal communication, then that's how you should connect with potential customers. Or if you're better at typing, then you probably should develop a blog.

Ordinarily, customers will not purchase your products or services unless they can trust you or your brand. And of course, the only way to establish trust is through reliable service (Brand Credibility). You must prove customers can spend their hard-earned money through your platform. Therefore, building your platform is essential.

3) Find Affiliate Programs Related to your Business

Step 3) Step three involves finding affiliate programs related to your business. Throughout this process, it's advised to research affiliate programs. Market research won’t cost a dime, but it requires time, skills, and dedication. It’s an essential step in becoming an affiliate. The research will provide you with indispensable information and help you develop a better understanding of the market. Consequently, you can develop strategies in advance, avoid pitfalls, and find opportunities.

4) Join Affiliate Programs

Step 4) Joining affiliate programs does not cost a dime. It only takes only a few minutes. All you need is a valid email address, valid checking account, PayPal, and an address or P.O. box. Then you can find an affiliate program in any industry, i.e., business, eCommerce, health, travel, weight loss, etc.

Not all companies use the same method to pay their members. Therefore, if you want to get paid, you must keep your options open. Most importantly, read over each privacy policy to assure you have the correct credentials.

First, sign up for a bank account if you do not have one. Then sign up for a PayPal account and link your bank account to PayPal. Most companies pay members by direct deposit, PayPal, or check by mail.

Keep in mind, as an associate, you are an independent contractor. So when you earn over $600, you must pay uncle Sam. Therefore, you will fill out a W-9 in most cases.

5) Promote your Affiliate Campaign

(Step 5) After you build your platform, you must promote affiliate links to earn profits. There are several options for promotion, some are free and others cost money. However, reaching as many customers as possible is the key to generating profits as an affiliate. Therefore, don’t just limit yourself to one or two outlets for promotion. Instead, use as many outlets as possible. You can promote using content marketing, email marketing, video marketing or search engine marketing (SEM), or search engine optimization (SEO).

Benefits of Affiliate Marketing

There are many advantages to becoming an affiliate marketer. To begin, it's easy to find leads. There are already people searching for the products that you are offering. In a sense, leads will find you.

Second, there are thousands of affiliate programs on the Web. There are opportunities in just about any industry (e-commerce, airlines, health, and beauty). This allows you to have access to an array of customers!

Last but not least, you can make money with no investment. These opportunities are free! If you're a beginner, you might want to learn how to market. Therefore, you might purchase marketing material. But that's outside of affiliate marketing.

It's One of the Fastest Growing Networks

There are several reasons why you should consider affiliate marketing. First and foremost, affiliate marketing enables you to get paid while you sleep! There are few online business opportunities in which you can generate income on auto-pilot. Usually, you must be active or present to make money.

In addition, these opportunities can provide you with multiple sources of additional income! Ultimately, you can retire young and secure financial independence. This is a reality for some people and an imagination for others. This can become your reality if you're willing to remain patient and work relentlessly. You can reach people around the world, substantially extending your ability to increase revenue.

Additional reasons you consider affiliate marketing, a few reasons are:

  • In the United States, over 70% of 4-year-olds have used a computer.
  • Over 50% of 21-year-olds have created content on the web.
  • One out of eight couples married in 2005 met online.
  • If My-space were a country, it would be the 8th largest country in the world.
  • If Meta (Former Facebook) were a country, it would be the third largest company in the world.
  • Internet devices by year, 1984 (1000), 1992 (1,000,000), 2006 (600,000,000).
  • Internet connected computer users in 2010 1.8 billion.
  • Mobile phone internet connections in 2010 5 billion.
  • Years it took to reach a market audience of 50 million (Radio-38 yrs, Television-13 yrs, Internet-4 yrs).

There are several other reasons marketers should consider affiliate marketing. But, overall, it enables you to earn extra money. All you need to do is find programs that are related to your platform.

Simple to Find Leads

Your affiliate business depends on leads, prospects, and customers. Lucky for you, it's simple to find leads. You can attract targeted leads, prospects for free! You find customers through classified ads, search engine optimization, search engine marketing, and more.

If you want to maximize your efforts, research search engine optimization (SEO). It is the most inexpensive way to boost profits!

Classified ads will give you the opportunity to promote your marketing campaign, mainly free. It gives you the ability to place any product or service you have to millions of viewers for at no cost.

Social media should be one of your major focuses. If you can outperform your competitors on Twitter, Facebook, or YouTube, you can gain a competitive advantage. Why is social media so effective? A majority of internet users are active on social media daily.

Does not Require a Website

You don't need a website for affiliate marketing, but it sure makes it easier to promote products online. All you need is a valid email address and you're ready to go. But you should build a website or blog. These platforms can give you an advantage in the market. With a site, you can generate unlimited amounts of traffic.

If you do not have a website, there are still ways you can promote affiliate products. 1) Use free article directories. 2) Advertise on social media sites. 3) Promote campaigns on classified ads.

Anyone can Join

Why is affiliate marketing the best opportunity on the Web? The answer is simple, anyone can join! Average people across the world are earning easy money by becoming affiliate marketers. Anyone can join! All you need to do is sign up, market products, then earn money. The process is simple. You don't have to be a guru to achieve success.

Make Passive Income

If you lean towards affiliate programs to make passive income, you've made the right choice! Affiliate marketing is the perfect fit. Not only can you earn passively, but you can earn huge profits. The best part about it, you don't need a product or service. There are many companies that need marketers to promote or sell their products. This is a win-win situation for both parties.

Meet your Financial Goals

Is it an average income, residual income, or financial freedom you're seeking? These programs I show you will give you a way to meet one goal after the next. Once you find your niche and what you like doing, there is no limit to how much money you will earn.

"Money frees you from doing things you dislike. Since I dislike nearly doing everything, money is handy". —Groucho Marx

Featured in: quotefancy.com-groucho-marx-quotes

The rate at which you earn a commission depends on how much time and effort you spend. The value of your content. At a day job, typically, quality work is the key to success? The same rules apply online, you must provide quality to increase earnings.

No Startup Fees

In the real world, it takes money to make money. Take real estate, for example; you need start-up money to invest in property. Or, if you wanted to start any type of franchise business, it's going to take some type of currency to start up, usually a loan from the bank. But there are no fees associated with affiliate marketing.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Affiliate Marketing Beginners Guide to Success
Affiliate marketing for beginners guide. Discover the complete guide to attain success as an associate.
affiliate marketing, affiliate marketing for beginners, associate marketing, affiliate marketing beginners guide

item.title: 5 Ways to Find Your Niche
item.dc:creator: dejuanjones101
item.content:encoded:
These days, you don’t have to live your life doing something you don’t want to do for a living. Nor do you have to work for a company you don't enjoy. Thanks to modern technology, you can shape your future as you see fit. It all starts with making a choice to do what you enjoy doing for work. This is called, finding your niche. But how can you find your niche?

Before you can find your niche, you must understand the definition of a niche. A niche is a strong suit or talent that you can monetize. The process involves examining your skills, hobbies, previous jobs, and so on.

How to Find Your Niche

Identifying your strong suit could be easy or hard. Everyone is different. Some people can find their niche by examining activities that they enjoy. Whereas others have to dig a bit deeper. In either case, 5 methods that will help you find your niche are as follows:

  • Identify your passion.
  • Analyze problems you can solve.
  • Find your purpose.
  • Link your talent and skills to opportunities.

When it comes to entrepreneurship, Why do you need to find your niche? It allows you to showcase your best talents! Exploiting your niche allows you to be more flexible. Imagine yourself working from home, creating your own schedule, spending more time with friends and family. Doing what you love or enjoy doing for a living. Life can definitely be more enjoyable! Ultimately, discovering your niche enables you to achieve success on many levels.

1) Identify Your Passion

The key to achieving success online is to find which category suits you the best (your passion). Therefore, the first step to finding your niche is identifying your passion. The aim is to find something you love to do, something that you enjoy, a topic that brings a smile to your face. More importantly, a topic that you have an understanding about. You can enjoy working by choosing to create content on a topic that you possess. So if you have an online presence or you have marketing skills and experience, pursue affiliate marketing. If you're a jack of all trades, become a freelancer. Or if you're a content creator, start a blog. The idea is to find a system that suits you!

2) Analyze Problems You Can Solve

If you want to be your own boss, you must have the ability to problem solve. Therefore, you must analyze problems you can solve. Try to find a topic or subject that interests you. For instance, if you like to read books and you're passionate about cooking. You could make money publishing books. Here are a few questions to help you analyze problems you can solve:

  • Can you show people how to do things? Can you show people how to fix cars, computers, ride bikes, raise kids, get jobs, write resumes, tie shoes, or correctly floss your teeth?
  • What problems can you solve? Can you answer problems concerning marriages, anger issues, websites, blogs or dating? Which questions can you answer? Can you answer questions about math, reading, health, food and nutrition, mental illness, sports, or religion?
  • Are you a talented musician, dancer, comedian, actor or actress?
  • Can you help coaches with football, basketball, baseball, golfing or juggling issues?

Your idea does not have to come from this list. These are a few ideas to get your mind going. It's ultimately up to you to decide what fits you best. However, keep in mind your chances of success increase when you choose an idea you're passionate about.

3) Find Your Purpose

After you identify problems you can solve, you can take the results to find your purpose. Identifying your purpose will help you understand which industry you should pursue, better yet, the most profitable industry. It will spark a fuse and give you a sense of meaning. This will help you develop confidence.

4) Examine Your Talents and Skills

I believe every person has a talent. Everyone is good at something. Your inner skills and talents usually result in you having some sort of passion for what you're good at. If you want to become a successful entrepreneur, you must have a passion for whatever online business opportunity you pursue. What you decide to do for a living must suit your talent. Especially for those who plan to create a website or blog.

5) Identify Your Developer Characteristic Resemblance

Defining your developer characteristics is the key to exploiting your niche. You must find out which developer category your characteristic resemble the most. Here are categories you can scan:

  • Helpful developers–The helpful developer creates a business because they seek to help others. Ordinarily, this individual has had a problem with a product or service in the past. The helpful creator seeks to improve the product or service. Passion inspires and drives helpful creators.
  • Niche developers–The niche or passionate creator launches an endeavor based on what he/she is passionate about. Historically, passionate creators have been able to adapt to the market without difficulty. They found it easier to connect with their target audience because of a shared interest. Independence developers–The independence developer launches a company to have control over his/her time. Usually, this individual becomes tired of working for someone else and takes control of their future. Or, they have worked for someone else and realized, “they have more to offer”.
  • Innovative developers–An innovative creator is an individual that brings new ideas or products to the marketplace. These owners thrive because they bring creativity and originality to the market. The innovative developer can stand out because their products and ideas are one of a kind.

Once you determine the category that resembles your character, search for opportunities. You can launch a blog, start a vlog, or launch a podcast, etc. It's essential to pursue an industry in which you have skills, or enjoy.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Learn how to find your niche, identify your passion, find your purpose, analyze problems you can solve, and link your skills.
find your niche, how to find your niche, ways to find your niche, learn how to find your niche

item.title: Journey to Entrepreneurship
item.dc:creator: dejuanjones101
item.content:encoded:
Everyone's journey to entrepreneurship usually has a story behind it. Some are extraordinary, others basic. My story is probably in between.

I was a high school football standout, recruited all over the nation living in Washington State. I committed to attending the University of Idaho on a football scholarship. Somehow, my scholarship did not fan out as I expected. The head coach who recruited me took a job at the University of Nevada.

My spirits were down, but I knew I still had a shot to make it to the NFL. My high school coach recommended Yuba College. After speaking to the junior college coach, I was on board. He told me I could compete for the defensive end position. However, on the first day of practice, he named his starters and told me to go play offensive line, center, to be exact. Just to give you an idea, I'm six feet tall, and I weighed two hundred and fifty pounds. This tore me apart.

After hearing the news, I broke down. So I began to self-destruct. Like most college kids going through depression, I started partying and living the college life. I still played football, but I didn't have the same drive. I rarely played during the season as a substitute tight end. Finally, my time to shine came at another player's misfortune. The sophomore defensive end got injured before the bowl game. I was unstoppable. I led the defense in sacks and tackles.

After the game, I went back to my dorm thinking to myself, I finally had time to showcase my talent. I wasn't at my best; the entire season, I did not focus.

My sophomore year of college went by even faster. I was a starter, but football was not my passion anymore. My passion was to become an entrepreneur. So after my sophomore year, I dropped out.

My Journey to Entrepreneurship

How did my journey to entrepreneurship start? I realized with all the time I spent on the internet anyway, why not earn cash on the Internet? I started thinking about my future and how I could find some way to generate residual income. I wanted to live life, instead of existing. This was important to me because I felt most employers didn't appreciate or consider my value. Nor did they pay me what I was worth.

When I began searching for internet opportunities, I spent thousands of dollars trying to find scam free opportunities. Time after time, I got scammed. Many times I felt like giving up on it. But I was adamant about generating a decent income from home. I didn't want to step away empty-handed and hoped that I could weed out the scams from the legit options. It's always good to have the feeling of not being scammed. Knowing that you have found something that will work.

I stubbornly continued to search for an option where I could legitimately get paid. One day, I uncovered a verified and legit way to earn a supplemental income, and specifically, residual income. Then I found one legitimate program after the next. I soon found so many legit options that many of the programs I did not have the time to join. In the beginning, I leaned towards affiliate programs. I desired and needed a verified system guaranteed to earn riches. I chose affiliate marketing because there are many programs out that need webmasters to sell their products. There are many webmasters that need a product to market. This is a win-win situation for both parties.

Deciding To Become an Entrepreneur

The internet was a whisper. People were not using the Internet as they do nowadays. I remembered how much I loved playing on computers when I was a kid. Something infatuated me with how computers work, thanks to my fourth-grade teacher. Then it hit me, I would become an entrepreneur and become wealthy by exploiting business opportunities. I didn't have to be an athlete to become wealthy.

Daily I vigorously searched for ways to earn online. Waking up at 5 o'clock every morning to go to work was not for me. Doing the same task, day in and out, working for companies that did not appreciate my value.

If you are striving to become an entrepreneur you must develop tough skin! You must develop an apathetic mindset!

Dejuan Jones

Following months of research on the internet, I wanted to give up. I was searching day and night for ways to generate revenue online for free. Sometimes, I stayed up for three days in a row. However, every time I seemed to find an opportunity, there was always a string attached. All websites and blogs appeared to be the same, selling dreams and false hopes.

Taking My First Step

Finally, I took action; I committed myself to tell the truth. This way I can help people avoid the same issues I went through. In addition, I can teach something of value. During this period, there were few websites or blogs telling the truth about earning online revenue.

I researched every internet business opportunity. Then I tested site by site to assure authenticity. As a content creator, I felt it was my duty to provide legitimate information to the people reading my content. If I did not provide legitimate material, it would have gone against the reason I developed the website.

The next task was to study websites similar to mine. The research left me puzzled. My competitors had wonderful content with creative designs. I could not find a flaw in any of my competitors. Since their content was great, I knew mines had to be greater. So I implemented everything that I did not view on their sites. I researched other niches besides my competitors.

Earning My First Penny Online

Months later, I earned a fraction of a penny online. Earning pennies on a dollar would have been a disappointment for most, not me! This was the beginning of my entrepreneurship journey. I figured if I could earn under a penny, I could also earn a million, maybe maximize my income.

Transition to Becoming Successful

Finally, I am earning the money I have always dreamed of. Every day I wake up, there's more money in my account. Do I stop here? No, I push to help others achieve the goals and financial success that I have achieved. I want to show entrepreneurs that not all work at home jobs are scams because people really get discouraged after failing time after time. The only way you can fail is simply not applying yourself.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: How did my journey to entrepreneurship start? I realized with all the time I spent on the internet anyway, why not earn cash on the Internet?

item.title: Where to Sell Unwanted Items
item.dc:creator: dejuanjones101
item.content:encoded:
Are you searching for a way to earn cash instantly? Do you know where to sell items online? Have you ever considered selling unwanted items? Selling your stuff is one of the fastest ways to earn cash from the internet. You can list your stuff within minutes; then sell unwanted items within hours.

On top of that, it doesn't require much work or entrepreneurship skills. You don't even need to be internet savvy. It's a 3 step process, take a photo, create a description, and list your price. More importantly, you can reach thousands of potential customers at the click of a button. Best of all, you gain 100% profit by selling merchandise. All you need is an electronic device (mobile phone, laptop, desktop computer) with an internet connection. And, of course, an item to sell or trade.

Best Apps to Sell Unwanted Items

Did you know each year billions of dollars are earned through selling items? What does this information apply to you? Well, this could be a side hustle for extra cash or you can turn this opportunity into a full-time income. If you think about it, you can easily earn $500 - $1000 a month. It all depends on how much time you invest.

Check out this story: 28-year-old earned $2400 in 4 months selling online.

In the past, most people sold their items on Craigslist. Nowadays, there are several apps and sites you can use to sell your unused items. You can sell items on popular platforms like Facebook, Instagram, or Amazon. Or you can sell your stuff on Flyp, Depop, Tradesy, or Vinted. Best are the best apps to sell unwanted items online:

Craigslist

Craigslist has been a major resource for sellers since 95'. Across the globe, internet entrepreneurs have earned thousands selling products through classified ad sites. It's one of the best side hustles of the internet. Many people around the world use these basic techniques to sell items on Craigslist, and so can you.

Decluttr

DeCluttr is a place to get rid of things you have lying around. Have you ever heard the saying "one man's trash is another mans' treasure"? Hence, some of your items might not serve you value, but that same item could be the most precious gift in the world to someone else. Items like phones, CDs, DVDs, books, tablets, iPads, and many others.

LendMeit

LendMeit is a resource you can use to rent out goods where you live. This particular app is a community-based platform. In other words, it's designed to do business (rent goods) with people in your neighborhood. Most sites allow you to sell items anywhere, but this is one of the first P2P online rental communities.

Mercari

Mercari is one of the hottest selling apps on the internet. You get $5 for listing your first item, and you can sell just about anything new or used. This includes purses, electronics, toys, and more. They do not require sellers to meet up with people. All you have to do is list it and ship it. Even better, you receive most of the profits, 90% goes to you, the other 10% goes to the company.

OfferUp: Buy Sell, Letgo

OfferUp is a mobile-driven marketplace used for buying and selling merchandise online. The company was launched in 2011 by Nick Huzar and Arean van Veelan. OfferUp's initial differentiation strategy was to distinguish itself from its rival (Craigslist) by being a mobile-friendly app with user rating capabilities. The strategy work and the company gained a competitive advantage in its respective marketplace. Currently, OfferUp is one of the most popular mobile markets in its niche. According to, OfferUp is ranked as the 6th highest shopping app in the U.S with over 50,000,000 downloads.

Poshmark

Poshmark has a unique organization. They specialize in fashion and do a stellar job at it, I might add. People come here to buy and sell in fashion. Therefore, if you're an individual that likes the finer things in life, Poshmark could be a valuable resource.

SellCast

SellCast is a live video platform for buying, selling, and crowdfunding. Once you're ready to sell your product, simply go live on social media and market the product to buyers. Sellcast is the first company of its kind to offer a live video for buyers and sellers.

ThredUps

ThredUp is one of the largest online thrift stores around the globe. Customers who shop at this digital store are searching for high-quality second-hand clothes. So if you have designer clothes that you don't wear anymore, post them. It would be better to earn some of your money back as opposed to throwing them away and getting nothing.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Find out where to sell unwanted items through legitimate applications (apps). Learn how to profit from your stuff or merchandise.
sell unwanted items, sell your stuff, make money from your stuff

item.title: How to Sell an eBook, Profitable Tips
item.dc:creator: dejuanjones101
item.content:encoded:
Why should you learn how to sell an ebook? Selling ebooks is one of the best approaches to make money online. According to The Association of American Publishers, in 2019, ebook sales were around $1.94 billion in the U.S. One can only imagine the amount of revenue that is generated globally.

11 Tips to Sell an eBook and Get Paid from Content

Can you make money selling ebooks? Yes, nowadays people want things right away! The internet gives us access to things we need at the touch of a button. We can shop online, watch tv online and movies. But we can also read digital publications (ebooks). Of course, if we can read publications online, others must write publications online.

If you want to make money selling ebooks, you must learn how to develop an ebook. That way, you don't waste your time or money. More importantly, you can get paid for your content. Below are 11 effective tips:

1) Establish Method of Publishing

It is important to understand the publishing method from the beginning to the end. To publish a book, one may opt for self-publishing or traditional publishing. You should base your decision upon the cost and intensiveness of the procedure, among other reasons after comparing and contrasting. One should go for the one less costly if they publish for the first time.

2) Format Your Book

Your book must be professionally formatted. This includes inserting page numbers, text alignment, and headers. The formatting should not be exaggerated, as it could lead to the book losing its intention to the audience. Here, you may choose to do it on your own or make use of third parties, like editing apps or professional editors.

3) Choose an Appropriate Title

You should go for an unforgettable title that also creates an appetite for reading. This means the title should be clear, brief, and intriguing. But more importantly, the title must match your content. Originality is essential, and that requires research before settling on a title.

4) Write a Description

You should optimize your book description. This can be done by using keywords and categories. It should also summarize hook the reader’s attention.

5) Create a Cover Page

The cover page created should be eye-catching and genre-indicative to your work. The cover may be photo-based, typography-based or illustration-based. These make it to be unique and direct to the point.

6) Write a Rough Draft

After developing your description, it's advised to create your rough draft. But not just any rough draft, you need to develop a strategic rough draft. One that captivates the audience.

When it comes to book writing, it's critical to demand the reader's attention from the start. If not, the reader will lose interest. So, your job as a publisher is to keep their eyes glued to your content.

7) Edit and Finalize Your Rough Draft

Before publishing, it needs to undergo thorough editing. This improves the cohesiveness of its content and eliminates possible errors. It's advised to use a third party (professional editor). No one wants to read uncoordinated writing. Therefore, sufficient attention is vital to ensure quality work. After editing, it's advised to get straight into finalizing while the content is still fresh in your mind.

8) Get FeedBack

Feedback. After thorough editing, one should strive to get feedback from others concerning his or her work. The best places to get honest and unbiased feedback are critique circles, writing communities, and beta readers. You will get accurate information regarding the content of the book and how they perceive it.

9) Publish Your eBook

Publishing your book can become a stressful process. Because the goal is perfection. But as long as you follow the correct steps, you'll be fine. But when you're ready to publish your ebook, you can use platforms like Amazon, books, and CreateSpace.

10) Advertise and Promote Your eBook

After publishing, your ebook needs exposure. Therefore, you must identify marketing strategies to create awareness of its existence to enhance its marketability. Luckily, there are several ways to market your book. In fact, you can advertise and promote your ebook through social media sites like Facebook, Twitter, and Myspace.

11) Set Up Online Store

As noted, you'll need to get the word out to sell your ebook. You can make use of blogs, promotional websites, and third-party promotional services. platform to promote and sell your content. In addition, you can set up a landing page, start a blog, or set up an online store. Though setting up a online store will take a while, it is worth it.

In conclusion, we should not let insufficient resources hinder us from coming up with books. Great minds need to be developed daily, and thus the need to learn self-publishing as the traditional means is proving to be taking long.

item.title: Over 100 Creative Side Hustle Ideas
item.dc:creator: dejuanjones101
item.content:encoded:
Why do you need creative side hustle ideas these days? To start with, it's expensive to live this day and age. You can't live comfortable unless you're not earning six figures; even more in many cities. Therefore, you must find an opportunity to earn additional income.

Side Hustle Benefits

What are the benefits of a side hustle? What if you lose your job or your car breaks down? You may even need a vacation! Even more importantly, no one has job security these days. I think it's safe to say, we can't predict the future. Therefore, it's essential to have a backup plan to be prepared for any situation. So the primary reason for discovering side hustle ideas is to earn supplemental income.

Most people wouldn't mind earning a few extra coins from home. But as we all know, money doesn't grow on trees. And it's nearly impossible to survive without money. Therefore, it's vital to find ways to gain more money. To tell the truth, everyone should brainstorm side hustle ideas to earn extra money from home.

The Best Side Hustle Ideas

Why are side hustle ideas valuable? Side hustle ideas are not only opportunities to make easy money, but an opportunity to find your purpose. These days, you can shape your own future. You don’t have to live your life doing something you don’t want to do for a living. However, it begins with making a choice to dedicate yourself to doing more than the average person.

As noted anyone can utilize these opportunities, even children in some cases. If kids & teens can make money from opportunities, you can too! Below are the best side hustle ideas anyone can use to earn a supplemental income;

1) Multi Level Marketing

Most people are skeptical when they hear the term "multi-level marketing". And, by all means, people have valid reasons to be doubtful about the past. Back in the day, people were getting scammed by get-rich-quick schemes left and right. People became fearful of pursuing internet side hustles.

But there are currently several legitimate multi-level marketing (MLM) opportunities. People can find opportunities in industries, including health, food, telecommunications, and many others. However, every opportunity is not for every person. Hence, if you're not a fan of referral marketing, attending conferences, or meeting and greeting, don't pursue MLM. On the flip side, if you enjoy marketing and networking, you can earn generously from multi-level marketing.

2) Place Advertisements on Your Car

If you drive, why not place advertisements in your car to make money? You can rake in thousands of dollars by placing ads on your vehicle. Placing advertisements on your can enable you to earn $200 - $2000 per campaign.

Through this opportunity, you have nothing to lose and everything to gain. As an owner, you don't have to worry about your car being damaged. When it's all said and done, your car will look professional. And if any damages occur, these companies will take care of the problem.

3) Accept Donations

Accepting donations can generate huge earnings. It's one of the most profitable side hustle ideas. Some publishers receive several thousands of dollars accepting donations. You may not want to use this as your dominant strategy to generate cash. However, if you're looking for another way to earn extra income, accepting donations can be of use. The revenue gained from donations may actually surprise you.

4) Earn Cash Back

Did you know you can make money from your receipts? You can also earn cash back from apps! What's more important, these are not low end department stores. These are popular stores most people shop at like Walmart, Target, Nike, Sams Club, Lowes, and many more.

5) Get Paid to Sleep

Can you get paid to sleep? Well, it depends on what city you live in. You can find opportunities in most major cities. Once you find an opportunity, you must qualify for the study. If you qualify, you can earn generously. A few resources are sleepjunkie.com and eachnight.com.

6) Get Paid to Click Ads

Visiting websites is a fun side hustle. It will expand your horizon by visiting websites you've yet to see. Which can teach you a-lot and open your mind as well. But to be honest, you can't get rich visiting websites, but you can get paid to click ads and earn pocket change. In order to make it worth your while, you need visit these sites regularly. Additionally, use more than one site to ensure your making the most out of your time.

7) Start a Laundromat Business

Why not start a laundromat business? Starting a laundry business requires a huge start-up fee. However, a laundry business will pay off in the long haul. On average, a laundromat business costs around $200,000 - $100,0000 to start up. It can take anywhere between 2 and 6 years to earn back your total return on investment. The amount of revenue your business earns depends on how busy your business is and which city you live in. The average laundromat profits $3000 - $8000 per month.

8) Make Money From Apps

Over the last ten years, the applications have taken the mobile industry by storm. This is primarily due to the innovation of businesses and technology. Millions of applications (APPS) have been launched. Consequently, thousands of developers have became rich. On the contrary, average people can make money from apps, including you!

9) Make Money From Craigslist

If you're seeking to get cash instantly, you can make money on Craigslist. Selling your stuff is one of the easiest ways to earn a few bucks without doing too much work. However, there are more ways to make money on CL besides selling. You can earn from gigs, find job opportunities, or post your talents to generate income.

10) Sell Information

Most people wonder if it's possible to make money by selling information. The answer is yes! If you have extensive knowledge on a topic, why not get paid for sharing your knowledge. There are several ways to sell information. Blogging is the most popular strategy for selling information. But you can also sell info through social videos, podcasts, online courses.

11) Sell Physical Products

Selling physical products online can be one of the biggest moneymakers. You can resell products or sell your own products. There are many sites that will allow you to sell merchandise. A few sites are Letitgo, OfferUp, and eBay. If you are artistic, you can promote your arts and crafts.

12) Sell Unwanted Items

If you sell unwanted items you gain %100 profit. Of course, minus your initial cost. You can also find wholesale products in bulk to resell, basically becoming the middle man. There are many wholesale products that you can purchase from companies. Afterwards, you can turn around and resell these products.

13) Take Surveys

Millions of dollars have been earned taking surveys. Many survey sites will give members $5 just for signing up. Not many individuals like the idea of turning down money. Taking surveys can add a few dollars to your bank account if you're looking for ways to earn extra money. Be sure you have anywhere between 15 minutes - 1 hour open, because it will take time to complete. More importantly, find the best survey sites so you can increase your earnings.

100 Additional Creative Side Hustle Ideas

Are you searching for legitimate ways to earn additional income from home? Well, look no further, below you'll discover over 100 additional creative side hustle ideas:

  1. Advertise digital products,
  2. Amazon jobs,
  3. Arts and crafts,
  4. Assemble easter egg baskets,
  5. Attend focus groups,

  8. Be an extra for movies,

item.title: How to Make Money on Pinterest in 6 Steps
item.dc:creator: dejuanjones101
item.content:encoded:
In this guide, I'll explain how to make money on Pinterest in 6 steps. Even more, I'll describe ways to make money on Pinterest without using a blog or a website! What does this mean? You can start earning money on Pinterest with no money upfront. In fact, you can make a thousand dollars a week with little or no experience.

How to Make Money on Pinterest

How can you make money on Pinterest? Well, it's simple. Pinterest is nothing like most social networks. To be more specific, most social media networks restrict publishers from sharing affiliate links or promoting affiliate programs. Whereas, Pinterest encourages members to post links and make. How to make money on Pinterest, six steps:

1) Build a Landing Page

First, you need to create a landing page. The landing page provides you with a platform to send targeted leads, prospects, and customers.

What is a landing page? When it comes to internet marketing, a landing page (destination page, lead capture page, squeeze page) is a signal web page used for marketing or promoting a product, service, or message. It's called a landing page because it's where the visitor lands. There are two types of landing pages, a reference landing page, and a transactional landing page.

Reference landing page - a reference landing page displays information that's essential to the customer. This page consists of text, images, and links. The purpose of the reference landing page is to lead the customer to the transactional page.

Transactional landing page - the transactional landing page contains information that influences customers to take action.

Option #1 (Purchase a landing page) In my opinion purchasing a landing page is the best option simply because you have more control over your content. You can tweak the theme, customize the background, edit code, and much more. Whereas, you have no control over a free landing page. All in all, you have a better chance to influence consumers when you purchase a site. If you are on a limited budget, I suggest purchasing a site through Bluehost.

Option #2 (Get a free landing page) If you don't want to pay for a landing page. You can create a free landing page on linktree.com. Linktree is a freemium social media landing page. You can use this platform to post your affiliate links, products links, or profile links. Here you can post whatever links you desire!

2) Create a Pinterest Business Account

If you want to grow your Pinterest page quickly, it’s essential to create a Pinterest business account. Not only does the business account help you grow faster, but it gives you access to valuable tools like analytics and ads. Do not forget to include the link to your landing page on your Pinterest business account profile.

3) Build an Active Following

To make money on Pinterest you must build an active following. I'm sure you're wondering how to build an active following. To state the obvious, marketing is the key to building an enthusiastic following! No matter which strategy you choose to make money on Pinterest, marketing is the key. So, if you don’t have marketing skills. You should take a marketing crash course. However, I'll show you a few secrets to gain followers.

4) Develop a Marketing Strategy

The key to growing your Pinterest account is marketing. Therefore, it's essential to develop your marketing strategy. A marketing strategy is a series of activities that organizations use to achieve and maintain a sustainable competitive advantage in the market. Developing a marketing strategy is time-consuming. It requires a significant amount of groundwork, studying, and patience. However, the end results are well worth the effort. Below, I'll share two marketing strategies to speed up the process;

5) Choose Strategies to Make Money on Pinterest

How do you make money on Pinterest? When it comes to Pinterest monetization, there are several. It is based on your resources. In other words, are you a website owner? Do you have tangible products for sale? Or, do you own digital products? If not, no biggie. You can still easily make money through Pinterest.

Ways to Make Money on Pinterest:

  1. Affiliate marketing - promote affiliate products for vendors as a third-party.
  2. Coaching - teach others strategies to make money on Pinterest.
  3. Consulting - explain how to gain traffic on Pinterest for a fee.
  4. Email marketing - build an email list on Pinterest, then sell it.
  5. Drive traffic to a website (online store, blog) - promote your website or blog.
  6. Partner with a brand - monetize your audience to businesses in your industry.
  7. Referral marketing - send referrals to companies and earn money.
  8. Seasonal marketing - market affiliate products during particular seasons, i.e. (Holidays, Black Friday, Easter) etc.
  9. Start a podcast - start a podcast and make money.
  10. Virtual assistant - become a Pinterest virtual assistant.

6) Market Your Opportunity

The final step involves promoting or advertising your product or service. There are three type of posts you can use to market your opportunity. There are three types of posts that you can create on Pinterest. You can create a pin, idea pin, or ad.

Ad - An ad is a paid advertisement you can use to promote your brand, business, or product, etc.

Pin - Pins are your bread and butter. These are bookmarks that people save. Therefore it's essential to create unique pins with detailed descriptions. You can post photos or videos in this section. More importantly, you can post affiliate links.

Idea Pin - An idea pin is a short story in video format. People save these pins as bookmarks. Hence, your content is key, (title, description) you must grab the audience's attention instantly.

Step #1 (Create a Canva account) - As noted, you must create unique photos. So you'll need to find a platform to make photos. Canva is one of the best resources for creating photos. You can create a free account and they provide access to tons of resources.

Step #2 (Create a TikTok account) - TikTok marketing is under rated. If you don’t have video content on TikTok, no worries. You can download viral videos by using snaptik.app. The reason for using snaptik.app is because you'll need to upload TikTok videos on Pinterest without a watermark. After you download the video on your device, you can upload it to your idea pins. Create a title, description, and make sure you give the TikTok owner credit for the video in your comments.

Step #3 (Create an Instagram account) - For those who don't know, Instagram is a video-sharing social network service. This network is similar to TikTok. Even more, you can repost. Therefore, you'll use the same strategy on Instagram as you used on TikTok.

FAQs

How long does it take to make money on Pinterest?

Like any business opportunity, it takes time to start earning revenue. All good things take time! You can’t build an empire overnight. Therefore, you must remain patient. It might take months. Possibly years to start earning thousands of dollars monthly. Hence, the key to success is patience.

What the benefits of making money through Pinterest?

A number of entrepreneurs are utilizing Pinterest as a resource to make money online. As a result, it has paid off. Not only can you boost your income. But, you can drive traffic to your websites as well. More importantly, it's an inexpensive way to earn income online. Memberships are free! On top of that, the work is not hard. You can get paid and have fun at the same time.

What tools do you need?

Well, there are three key ingredients that you need to start making money on Pinterest. First, you'll need a platform, i.e., blog site, website, social media page etc. The platform is essential, you'll need to use it as a landing page. It gives you a web location for your visitors. Secondly, you'll need marketing knowledge and skills. Marketing is the key to finding leads, prospects, and driving traffic to your platform. Thirdly, you must have customers. You need clients to make money!

item.title: Richest Internet Entrepreneurs from 2020 - 2023
item.dc:creator: dejuanjones101
item.content:encoded:
How did the the richest internet entrepreneurs become wealthy? For beginners, the internet has changed the way we live. It's become a part of our everyday lives! We use the internet to get information, communicate with friends and family, and entertainment. In addition, we use the internet to purchase goods and services. And, of coarse make money.

Do you want to become an entrepreneur? You can launch an online business without spending a fortune. In fact, you can find legitimate ways to make money online free.

For these reasons, there are more internet entrepreneurs reaching billionaire status than ever before. According to Forbes, there are 371 billionaires in the tech industry. The only industry that has more billionaires is finance and investments.

In 2010, there were 1,011 billionaires. Their combined wealth that year was $3.6 trillion. Carlos Slim was the wealthiest individual on that list with a net worth of $53.5 billion. Fast-forwarding to the present, there are 2,755 billionaires with a combined net worth of $13.1 trillion. The richest entrepreneur on this list is Jeff Bezos, whose net worth is $211 billion.

Who are the Richest Internet Entrepreneurs Worldwide

1. The Richest Internet Entrepreneur - Jeff Bezos

Founder of Amazon - Jeff Bezos is an American entrepreneur from Bellevue, Washington. He founded Amazon in the mid-90s. Initially, Amazon sold music and videos. Years later, the corporation began selling electronics, video games, software, and toys. In 1997, they released a tablet device called Kindle, which enabled readers to read e-books, digital content, newspapers, and magazines. As time passed, so did business, Amazon started selling electronics, apparel, games, and other products on the internet. A few years later, the network distributed streaming music, videos, audiobooks, and downloads. In 1996, they unleashed opportunities for affiliates. Amazon's associate program provided one of the first opportunities for individuals to earn an additional income online. At the beginning of the 21st century, the retail giant would move on to add Amazon work from home jobs to their impressive resume.

Jeff Bezos fun facts and accolades:

  • Net-worth: $115.7 billion.
  • Education: Princeton.
  • Influences: Pioneers like Bill Gates and Steve Jobs.
  • First major accomplishment: Started his own business in high school.
  • Fun fact 1: He flew to space in the summer of 2021.
  • Fun fact 2: Jeff Bezos played a role in the film 'Star Trek Beyond' as an alien.

2. Larry Ellison

Co-founder of Oracle - Larry Ellison is the co-founder and former CEO of Oracle. He resigned in 2014 but still serves as a chairman to the board and chief technology officer. Oracle went public in 1988 but would suffer huge setbacks two years later. It would take 6 years to turn the company back around. In 2018, Oracle was ranked 82nd on Forbes Fortune 500 list of largest United States corporations by total revenue.

Larry Ellison fun facts and accolades:

  • Net-worth: $112.1 billion.
  • Education: University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign.
  • Influences: Edgar F Codd's research (relationship database systems).
  • First major accomplishment: Mr. Ellison purchased 99% of an island (Lania) in Hawaii for $500-$600 million.
  • Fun fact 1: Forbes declared him as the richest person in California in 2006.
  • Fun fact 2: At nine months old his mother gave him up for adoption to her uncle and auntie who lived in a middle class neighborhood in Chicago.

3. Bill Gates

Founder of Microsoft - Bill Gates is an American entrepreneur (software developer, investor, philanthropist) from Seattle Wa. Mr. Gates is the co-founder of PC software firm Microsoft corporation, the largest software company in the world. In 1975 he and his friend Paul Allen founded the company in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

Bill Gates fun facts and accolades:

  • Net-worth: $104.9 billion.
  • Education: Harvard University (dropout).
  • Influences: Parents.
  • First major accomplishment: Wrote his first software program at 13.
  • Fun fact 1: He flew to space in the summer of 2021.
  • Fun fact 2: Jeff Bezos played a role in the film 'Star Trek Beyond' as an alien.
  • Fun fact 3: He was 10 points away from a perfect SAT score (1590).

4. Steve Ballmer

Microsoft CEO 2000 - 2014 - Steve Ballmer is an American businessman and investor from the United States. He joined Microsoft in 1980 as the first manager. In 1998 he became the president. Two years later he replaced Bill Gates and served as the CEO of Microsoft for 14 years (2000-2014).

5. Larry Page

Co-founder of Google - Larry Page is an American computer scientist and internet entrepreneur. His peers refer to him as a pioneer in computer science and artificial intelligence. Page is credited as the co-founder of Google, Alphabet Inc, and Pagerank along with his intellectual soulmate Sergey Brin.

6. Sergey Brin

Co-founder of Google - Sergey Brin is a computer scientist and American entrepreneur. He is known for being the co-founder of Google, Alphabet Inc, and Pagerank. In 1995 he and Larry Page would meet at Stanford University and team up and create a search engine, which would forever change how people live.

7. Mark Zuckerberg

CEO of Meta (Former Facebook) - Mark Zuckerberg is an American business magnet from White Plains, New York. He is mostly known for being the co-founder of Meta Platforms Inc (former Facebook). In 2006 Mark Zuckerberg and his roommates Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz, and Chris Hughes launched Facebook out of his Harvard dorm room. Originally Facebook was called Harvard. which was a social network for college students.

8. Mackenzie Scott

Novelist and philanthropist - Mackenzie Scott is an American novelist from San Francisco, California U.S. According to Forbes, she's the 22nd-wealthiest individual in the world. Mrs. Scott is the ex-wife of Jeff Bezos, the richest man in the world. After the couple separated in 2019, she was awarded a whopping $38 billion. However, Amazon has grown rapidly, now her shares are worth an estimated $58 billion. Since the divorce, she's been donating money faster than any billionaire has before.

9. Ma Huateng

Tencent CEO - Ma Huateng (Pony Ma) is a billionaire from China. In 2014, he was ranked as the 2nd richest person in China and 63rd richest person in the world. Huateng is the founder, chairman, and CEO of Tencent, 'Asia's most valuable company'. According to statistics, Tencent is the 7th largest tech company on the internet.

10. Colin Huang

Founder of Pinduoduo - Colin Huang is China's youngest billionaire. For the most part he is known for helping setup and launch Google China. Additionally, he is well-known as the founder of Pinduoduo. Prior to founding Pinduoduo, he interned at both Google and Microsoft.

11. Jack Ma

Founder of Alibaba - Jack Ma is a business magenta, philanthropist and one of China's top investors. More importantly, he's the co-founder and former executive chairman of Alibaba. Chinese businessman Jack Ma's rise to fame is impressive. He failed many times but did not let obstacles stop him from striving for his goals. For instance, after graduating college he applied to 31 jobs. However, he was rejected by each one. He even tried to get a job with KFC, but had no luck. Despite all of this he still went on to co-found Alibaba, the largest eCommerce platform in China.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Authentic list of the top 10 richest internet entrepreneurs from 2020 - 2023.
richest internet entrepreneurs, internet entrepreneurs, top internet entrepreneurs, wealthiest internet entrepreneurs, top 10 internet entrepreneurs

item.title: How Do You Make Money on TikTok
item.dc:creator: dejuanjones101
item.content:encoded:
The internet sensation, TikTok, has proved that videos are truly valuable in getting traffic. After its release in 2016, the Beijing invention has gone on to record over 1 billion monthly users in January 2022. This was a 45% increase over the reported figures six months earlier. This has left many wondering, how do you make money on Tiktok?

Recipe to Make Money on TikTok

With this traffic comes money. The social video app has also created a source of income for some of its users with a high level of traffic. While users with less than 10,000 followers may not earn anything, those with higher traffic can earn higher than $200 each month – going as high as $5,000.

This guide is to help you understand how the high earners on TikTok make their money as well as some hacks to get there as fast as possible.

The Prerequisites

This guide is exciting. However, it may not be so for some people who do not meet some basic requirements to earn from the site. They include the following;

1)You must be 18 years or older.

2)You must have a minimum of 10,000 followers on your account.

3)You must have had at least 100,000 video views in the last 30 days.

If you meet these requirements, you would be eligible to apply for the TikTok creator fund. You may now proceed with the rest of the article. Do hang on for the exclusive hack from TikTok influencers.

Exploit TikTok Creator Fund

This is TikTok’s special reward to you for driving traffic to it. The conditions are pretty much the same as those stated above. The way to get here is to start early in your efforts to create quality videos. With such videos, you would gain a healthy followership. Remember to stick to the community guidelines on TikTok.

Gain Followers

This has been one of the most important elements to make money on TikTok. Gain followers. After that, gain more followers. To achieve this, you should focus on creating great content and engaging with your followers as much as possible. When you have a signature on the platform, you stand to get followers that appreciate a specific type of content. More so, you could opt to sell your account to businesses that wish to harness your audience. The gains are much.

Sell Digital Products

You can use the platform to publicize products of any sort. This way, you can promote your e-commerce store or those of others through affiliate marketing. This advantage makes the site relatively open to different types of people – business savvy, creative, or artistic. Just sell your services online and the right market will come to you.

Create Sponsored Content

Like above, you can focus on helping brands reach more clients by creating content for them. This is usually a result of getting many followers, focusing on a niche, and having a high level of engagement. You can choose to contact these firms to work with them or create content that references them. They will come knocking.Like above, you can focus on helping brands reach more clients by creating content for them. This is usually a result of getting many followers, focusing on a niche, and having a high level of engagement. You can choose to contact these firms to work with them or create content that references them. They will come knocking.

Manage TikTok Accounts

If you are familiar with TikTok, why not manage TikTok accounts? You can easily make money while working off the camera. Take advantage of your marketing skills and video-creating experience by helping creators get more followers. You need not worry about your on-the-camera skills. Just focus on helping others succeed while you get the background credit. You can also work with multiple influencers in this role.

Try these TikTok influencer hacks;

1) Work with a team.

2) Focus on gaining followers.

3) Know what your followers want.

4) Create how-to videos, and many more.

Conclusion

TikTok is growing pretty fast. It’s fun and lovely. You can follow these guidelines to reach its teeming visitors and make yourself a fortune by creating excellent content.

item.title: Best Work From Home Jobs, Companies & Positions
item.dc:creator: dejuanjones101
item.content:encoded:
Most people would love to work from home. Working from home enables you to take control of your schedule. It gives you the opportunity to have more time with family. In addition, you don’t have to spend hours commuting to and from work, or working with nagging employees. Still, working from home requires discipline.

An ideal work-from-home job provides flexibility and the opportunity to work with less pressure. You can pick your schedule (full-time, part-time). You can explore the options and assess your chances at any of them. If you are already working from home, you can find your way to the top as well.

Work From Home Jobs

Working from home has become a common component of society. With the growth of the internet to the development of highly collaborative interfaces, the concept has found more reasons to stay. Recently, the escalation of the COVID-19 pandemic has necessitated it becoming a norm in society. Find work from home jobs below;

Work From Home Companies

As the statistics show an increase in remote work (over 70% in the US during the full swing of the pandemic), online meetings (over 50%), online reports and assessments, and many more; you will agree that the odds are in its direction.

  • Appen
  • Concentrix
  • Doctor On Demand
  • Colorado State University
  • Lionbridge
  • Liveopps
  • Pearson Prof360
  • Health Information Alliance
  • Pitchup
  • K12
  • Kaplan Kelly
  • Robert Half International
  • Rosetta Stone
  • Soliant Health United Healthcare
  • VocoVision
  • Working Solutions

There's no question, work from home jobs are starting to become the norm for employees. Several companies have work at home positions. More importantly, these positions that pay decent wages. So you can earn a generous income.

Work From Home Positions

Most work from home positions require certain skills. For individuals who meet those requirements, congratulations, you've taken one step further to earn money from home. For those of you who do not meet those requirements, there's still hope depending on which country you live in.

Be an Online Educator

Despite the restraints that arise across the world, the need for education has never been considered unnecessary. Besides, information is generated every day and people need to understand the details of these pieces of information. For example, when COVID-19 broke out, there was the need for home tutors, online tutors, health educators and instructors, and the likes. With a relevant degree, you could earn around $20 or more per hour in this role.

Marketing Consultant

We now spend hours with people that are miles away from us. It’s also a norm to walk around the corridors of a friend in another country right from the comfort of your bedroom. With this virtual traffic came an increase in online business activity. Marketing consultants help businesses harness this virtual traffic for their business goals. With a proper understanding of social media, SEO, email marketing, and online campaigns, you could earn around $15-100 each hour working in this role.

Website Developer

Websites and their related applications and architectures provide relevant avenues for the trends that we see these days. Sales are done on the internet, studies are on the internet, jobs are on the internet, the list goes on. Hence, the demand for experienced website designers and programmers has continued to increase. If you have a degree in computer science and some hands-on experience in web design languages, you can be on your way to earning some $12 to $40 per hour. You can also earn more as you gain relevant skills.

Amazon Work from Home Jobs

The e-commerce giant, Amazon, has lots of room for some of its over 1.3 million staff to work from home. There are tons of customer service representative roles available here. With some customer support and work-from-home experience added to a high school diploma, you could be earning somewhere around $37,825 each year, and prospects of $82,971 as a senior.

Freelancing from Home

With freelancing from home, your experience will never have a dull moment. The experience is such that you could fix yourself in any niche of your choice and change between niches as you wish. With various sites like Fiverr, Upwork, Freelancer, and FlexJobs, you can make the most of your technical, creative, and soft skills. There is no end to the number of jobs you can have or what you can earn. Depending on your experience, you can earn somewhere around $5 to $100 per hour working on these sites.

Customer Care Representative

Besides the role on Amazon, there is a continuous demand for customer care representatives across various companies. These jobs are typically easy and require dedication and consistency. You can earn around $12 to $50 per hour working in this role.

Find a Work from Home Position today!

As you can see, there are various work from home positions. Some of these are skilled positions. However, it will not take long to train for any position listed below. Most companies would prefer a college degree, however, you can qualify with experience in most cases.

item.content:encoded:
Ingredients to Make Money on Etsy

What elements do you need to make money on Etsy? If you have heard the name Rob Kalin, then you must have an idea about people who make up stuff out of almost nothing and earn a place in people’s hearts. Etsy is the best term to describe a business that seeks to make its users feel very comfortable and more human. It is a fast-rising online marketplace where buyers and sellers meet to do business. Below you'll find (tested and approved) the recipe to make money on Etsy selling downloads;

Artworks

Showcase your works of art to the Etsy market and see how much they would love you. You need not worry about having only a few persons coming around to appreciate your exhibition and not making a deal. That's not the same on Etsy. You would have someone love it. Move a step forward from social media. Let them not just send you hearts and make nice comments. Let them buy. That is the Etsy spirit. Get to work.

DIY Tools

As more people go remote and digital, the need for smart DIY tools embedded in smartphones and computer systems has gained widespread use and popularity. Hence, the market is a good place to sell your tools as you create them. With some training in applications programming, web designing, and UI/UX designing, you would be on your way to winning the love of many new generation smart applications users. The gains are enormous. Moreover, creating a quick feedback system is a great way to stay connected as you sell.

Graphics design templates

Many people are actively trying to get a following on social media and their websites but may not have the necessary skills to create sophisticated and attractive designs to achieve that. Moreover, even if they had, some are just too busy creating content and brainstorming strategies. When this happens, they end up having little or no time to make designs. This is where excellent templates come to play. With a basic knowledge of graphics designs concepts and skillfulness in using some design applications like the Adobe design suite and Corel Draw, you are good. What remains is creating some targeted designs and reaching your prospective clients.

Editable and Printable Cards

This is one very versatile market that cannot lose its traffic anytime soon. There are many options in printable cards that you can design. You can design birthday cards, wedding cards, business cards, different types of invitation cards, restaurant menu cards, and many more. Since these cards are editable, they are very convenient for customers. They can simply edit, download, and print for whichever purpose they choose. If you enjoy creating content, you can make money blogging by building templates.

Selling Digital Products on Etsy

Digital products are quite convenient to sell on Etsy. However, getting them out there for the clients to see and driving the traffic towards your storefront is the big deal. That is why you should identify and develop digital products your target audience desires. This exclusive guide will help you achieve this and meet your goals to earn money from your online store. Here are additional digital products you can sell:

  • Backgrounds,
  • Digital coloring books,
  • Clip arts,
  • Embroidery patterns,
  • Wall arts,
  • Computer and phone wallpapers,
  • Workbooks, and many more.

Etsy makes you feel human while achieving your dreams. Conduct a situational analysis and understand your market properly. Sell to them accordingly. Showcase your talents and sell your outputs as your products. It is as simple as that. When you are done doing that, repeat the process.

Trading Products on Etsy

This site is a great place for trading all sorts of products including handmade goods, vintage goods, and various categories of arts and crafts. The site has been bringing buyers and sellers in contact since 2005 and records over $5 billion worth of trade traffic each year – as reported in 2020.
